speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report by Olle Schmidt on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs on the ECB annual report for 2007 ( 2008/2107(INI) ( A6-0241/2007 ).
original: President. − The next item is the report by Olle Schmidt on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs on the ECB annual report for 2007 ( 2008/2107(INI) ( A6-0241/2007 ).
agenda_item: Report on the ECB annual report for 2007 (debate)
